original: 歷仕曹魏、西晉。曾參與平定諸葛誕在壽春發起的叛亂。後匈奴右賢王叛變寇邊，路蕃亦奉命出戰，最終大敗劉猛，劉猛被部屬李恪斬殺。
text: Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. Participated in the suppression of the rebellion initiated by Zhuge Dan in Shouchun. After the Hun Youxian king rebelled against Koubian, Lu Fan was also ordered to fight, and eventually defeated Liu Meng, who was beheaded by his subordinate Li Ke.
